item.title: Kai Dinghofer
item.description: … besides being an open-minded developer, I am also a regular human! I like to travel, take photos and crusing with my skateboard(s) whenever it is possible. Other hobbies include (but are not limited to) running, hiking and of course: diving. While I love communicating and intuitively connecting with people, it is an equal important part of me having the possibility to relax my mind exploring the world’s wonderful nature.

item.title: Bachelor Thesis
item.description: About one year after my Bachelor graduation, I asked myself: Why shouldn’t other people have the possibility to read my thesis? In my work, I analyzed how well the Ethereum Blockchain can be integrated into exisiting business processes of the FH Aachen. As a business process execution engine, I used the Open-Source Camunda BPM and wrote an own web3-connector to communicate with self-developed Smart Contracts. If you like my thesis, please consider a â˜• donation to my Ethereum address:
